description: Creamy burrata works perfectly with sweet and sticky grilled peaches in this delicious salad.
name: Grilled Peach, Burrata & Pistachio Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the peaches in half, remove the stone, slice each half into quarters and lightly brush with olive oil.
Heat a griddle pan over a medium high heat and place the peaches flesh side down for 2 minutes then flip and repeat on the other side.
Whisk balsamic vinegar, olive oil and maple syrup together in a small bowl. Place the rocket and grilled peaches on a serving platter.
Place the burrata on top and slice open, top with cracked black pepper, drizzle with dressing and scatter chopped pistachios all over before serving.
